articles.author: Charles Q. Choi
articles.title: 'Huge surprise' reveals how some humans left Africa 50,000 years ago - Live Science
articles.description: How did Homo sapiens manage to leave Africa around 50,000 years ago, when earlier treks out of the continent had ended in failure?
articles.content:
An illustration inspired by the prehistoric expansion of humans to different niches in Africa that occurred before a successful global dispersal. (Image credit: Jacopo Niccolò Cerasoni)
